original: saha dīrghā mama śvāsair imāḥ saṃprati rātrayaḥ /
analyzed: saha dīrghāḥ mama śvāsaiḥ imāḥ saṃprati rātrayaḥ

original: pāṇḍurāś ca mamaivāṅgaiḥ saha tāś candrabhūṣaṇāḥ // 2.352 //
analyzed: pāṇḍurāḥ ca mama eva aṅgaiḥ saha tāḥ candra bhūṣaṇāḥ
vardhate saga pānthānām mūrchayā cūta mañjarī

original: patanti ca samaṃ teṣām asubhir malayānilāḥ // 2.353 //
analyzed: patanti ca samam teṣām asubhiḥ malaya anilāḥ
kokila ālāpa subhagāḥ sugandhi vana vāyavaḥ
yānti sārdham jana ānandaiḥ vṛddhim surabhi vāsarāḥ

original: ity udāhṛtayo dattāḥ sahokter atra kāścana /
analyzed: iti udāhṛtayaḥ dattāḥ sahokteḥ atra kāścana
parivṛtti
kriyate parivṛtteḥ ca kiṃcid rūpa nirūpaṇam
śastra prahāram dadatā bhujena tava bhūbhujām
cira arjitam hṛtam teṣām yaśaḥ kumuda pāṇḍuram
āśīḥ
āśīḥ nāma abhilaṣite vastuni āśaṃsanam yathā
pātu vaḥ paramam jyotiḥ a vāc manasa gocaram
saṃsṛṣṭi
ananvaya sa saṃdehau upamāsu eva darśitau
upamā rūpakam ca api rūpakeṣu eva darśitam  /
utprekṣā bhedaḥ eva asau utprekṣā avayavaḥ ca
nānā alaṃkāra saṃsṛṣṭiḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ tu nigadyate
aṅga aṅgi bhāva avasthānam sarveṣām samakakṣa tā
iti alaṃkāra saṃsṛṣṭeḥ lakṣaṇīyā dvayī gatiḥ
ākṣipanti aravindāni tava mugdhe mukha śriyam
kośa daṇḍa samagrāṇām kim eṣām asti duṣkaram
limpati iva tamaḥ u ṅgāni varṣati iva añjanam nabhaḥ

original: asatpuruṣaseveva dṛṣṭir niṣphalatāṃ gatā // v v //)
analyzed: asat puruṣa sevā iva dṛṣṭiḥ niṣphala tām gatā

original: śleṣaḥ sarvāsu puṣṇāti priyo vakroktiṣu śriyam /
analyzed: śleṣaḥ sarvāsu puṣṇāti priyaḥ vakra uktiṣu śriyam

original: bhinnaṃ dvidhā svabhāvoktir vakroktiś ceti vāṅmayam // 2.363 //
analyzed: bhinnam dvidhā svabhāvoktiḥ vakroktiḥ ca iti vāṅmayam
bhāvika
bhāvika tvam iti prāhuḥ prabandha viṣayam guṇam

original: bhāvaḥ kaver abhiprāyaḥ kāvyeṣv āsiddhi yaḥ sthitaḥ // 2.364 //
analyzed: bhāvaḥ kaveḥ abhiprāyaḥ kāvyeṣu yaḥ sthitaḥ
paraspara upakāri tvam sarveṣām vastu parvaṇām
viśeṣaṇānām vyarthānām akriyā sthāna varṇanā
vyaktiḥ ukti krama balāt gambhīrasya api vastunaḥ

original: bhāvāyattam idaṃ sarvam iti tad bhāvikaṃ viduḥ // 2.366 //
analyzed: bhāva āyattam idam sarvam iti tat bhāvikam viduḥ
yat ca saṃdhi aṅga vṛtti aṅga lakṣaṇa ādi āgama antare
vyāvarṇitam idam ca iṣṭam alaṃkāra tayā eva naḥ

original: panthā sa eṣa vivṛtaḥ parimāṇavṛttyā saṃkṣipya vistaram anantam alaṃkriyāṇāṃ /
analyzed: panthā saḥ eṣa vivṛtaḥ parimāṇa vṛttyā saṃkṣipya vistaram anantam alaṃkriyāṇām

original: vācām atītya viṣayaṃ parivartamānān abhyāsa eva vivarītum alaṃ viśeṣān // 2.368 //
analyzed: vācām atītya viṣayam parivartamānān abhyāsaḥ eva vivarītum alam viśeṣān

original: // ity ācāryadaṇḍinaḥ kṛtau kāvyādarśe 'rthālaṃkāravibhāgo nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ //
